chapters.title: Prologue: The First Message
chapters.info: Sevanna, p. 44 (48)—A Wise One of the Shaido Aiel (recently inducted), and acting chief of the Shaido Aiel after Couladin's death. She is the widow of Suladric, the last official chief of the Shaido Aiel; after he died, she married the self-appointed, unofficial chief of the Shaido, Couladin. She made an alliance with the Tar Valon Aes Sedai to help capture Rand on the condition that she got to see his face after he was a prisoner. See also Couladin; Suladric.
